content: a simple lacy scarf with five panels of branching pattern repeats and a moss stitch edging border knitting skills you will need cast on cast off knit two stitches together bring the yarn forward knit through the back of the loop materials will need pair of straight 4 5mm us 7 knitting needles approximately 380m of dk weight yarn tapestry needle for weaving in ends approximate finished size 160 cm x 26cm 64ins x 10ins
